short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that performs string manipulations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

🔡 Text Case Conversion: Convert text to uppercase, lowercase, camelCase, snake_case, and kebab-case.

🔄 Basic Operations: Reverse text, capitalize words, and replace specific strings within your text.

🔐 Encoding/Decoding: Encode or decode text using URL encoding and Base64 encoding.

🔍 Substring Counting: Easily count the number of occurrences of any specific substring.

📊 Character Limit Display: Keep track of character count with a live progress bar and counter.
